articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Libyan Secretary
   Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Bashir Ramadan Khalifa Abu Janah, secretary of the People's Bureau of Libya to the DPRK, on Thursday when the latter paid a farewell call upon him.

South Side's Delegation to Festival for Korea's Reunification Arrives
articles.content:
South Side's Delegation to Festival for Korea's Reunification Arrives
   Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration led by Chairman Paek Rak Chong arrived here Thursday to participate in the grand festival for national reunification marking the 7th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
